tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE peer_to_peer_lending_assets (
  asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255),
  borrower_id INT,
  lender_id INT,
  tokenized_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
  date_borrowed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lender_id INT,
  borrower_id INT,
  asset_id INT,
  amount INT,
  status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID NOT NULL,
    receiver_id UUID NOT NULL,
    token_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Borrowers (
  borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_name VARCHAR(50),
  borrower_contact VARCHAR(100),
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  loan_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE LoanTransactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lender_id INT,
  borrower_id INT,
  asset_id INT,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (lender_id) REFERENCES Lenders(lender_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (borrower_id) REFERENCES Borrowers(borrower_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES TokenizedAssets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
 loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 loan_duration INT,
 borrower_id INT,
 lender_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (borrower_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (lender_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
 transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 asset_id INT,
 user_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES Assets(asset_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TokenizedAssets (
 asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 token_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 total_tokens INT NOT NULL,
 asset_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES Assets(asset_id)
);
